channel.title: Learn on today is tomorrow's past
channel.description: Recent content in Learn on today is tomorrow's past

item.title: Get Up And Start Walking
item.description: "" If you want something you never had, then do something you never did. "" — Nossrat Peseschkian When I heard the above quote for the first time, it was eye opening to me. Why? It expresses very clearly to me, that you need to get active, if you want to reach a goal in your life. No matter what it is. Get a promotion, earn more money, hike the Pacific Crest Trail.
